Art. 4.190. 
Penalty for failure to observe the required formalities 
The formalities to which the various wills are subject by the provisions of this chapter must be observed on pain of nullity.
The invalidity of a notarial will does not affect its possible validity as to form as an international will.
The invalidity of the will in international form does not affect its possible validity as to form as a will of another kind.
